text: Yih sun kar log āpas meṅ kahne lage, “Āo, ham Yarmiyāh ke ḳhilāf mansūbe bāndheṅ, kyoṅki us kī bāteṅ sahīh nahīṅ haiṅ. Na imām sharīat kī hidāyat se, na dānishmand achchhe mashwaroṅ se, aur na nabī Allāh ke kalām se mahrūm ho jāegā. Āo, ham zabānī us par hamlā kareṅ aur us kī bātoṅ par dhyān na deṅ, ḳhāh wuh kuchh bhī kyoṅ na kahe.”
